name: Ext_R3_ResearchStudy_status
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.ResearchStudy.status for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ResearchStudy.status from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ResearchStudy|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: draft | in-progress | suspended | stopped | completed | entered-in-error
element.definition: The current state of the study.
element.comment: `ResearchStudy.status` maps to R5 `ResearchStudy.status`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
element.isModifierReason: This extension is a modifier because the target element ResearchStudy.status is flagged IsModifier

element.short: draft | in-progress | suspended | stopped | completed | entered-in-error
element.definition: The current state of the study.
element.comment: `ResearchStudy.status` maps to R5 `ResearchStudy.status`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Codes that convey the current status of the research study
